subject: Re: Looking for equipment
author: Tom
full_text:
Dont forget thermometers to check for "cold spots"---Are the spots actually "Cold" or are they making us FEEL cold?
Also a compass for magnetic fluctuations.
Some of those ultrasonic or IR motion detectors (real cheap at radio shack)
A hygrometer for measuring dewpoint( at what temp water in air will condense to form a mist---great for correlating with cold spots---mist apparations)
A K2 meter--only 50 bucks or so.  great for "gross screening" of the area
A natural EM trifield meter  a bit expensive($200-250) but standard ghost hunting equipment.
